title: NISER Recruitment 2026 - Apply for 02 Research Scholar Posts
description: The National Institute of Science Education and Research (NISER) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Research Scholar Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech in Mechanical Engineering and Electrical Engineering can grab this chance and apply for the NISER Recruitment 2026 . Here, we mentioned more about the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Inte...
